meta.special_feature: Museum-quality 3D axonometric miniature posters for life highlights (ALL ENGLISH)

museum_poster_system_prompt.description: Museum-quality poster generation for life highlights
museum_poster_system_prompt.core_principle: Create a museum-quality 3D axonometric miniature poster for the given subject.

workflow.step_1: Scene Construction: Identify the category (sports, history, arts, science). Research the specific environment, character actions, costume details, and atmosphere. Build a detailed 3D miniature diorama at center, with DreamWorks animation quality materials and soft lighting. For sports: emphasize explosive action and frozen moment impact.
workflow.step_2: Atmosphere & Background: Use subtle ink wash texture with flowing light mist instead of plain white. Adjust color palette to theme. Create 'historic slice' or 'precious collection' premium quality.
workflow.step_3: Typography: Generate elegant ENGLISH typography at bottom center. Main title in powerful serif font matching theme. Below: famous quote, date, and historical significance in elegant serif. Layout like a museum collection nameplate - refined and balanced.

global_style_lock.art_style: Comic book illustration style with caricature elements. For life highlights (p07, p08, p10), use museum-quality 3D axonometric miniature poster style.
global_style_lock.character_consistency: Kobe Bryant with intense focused eyes, strong jawline, confident smile, athletic build. Lakers #8 (young, explosive) and #24 (mature, skilled). Consistent character design across all pages.
global_style_lock.color_palette: Lakers purple (#552583) and gold (#FDB927), black and gold for Mamba branding. Basketball court hardwood, bright arena lighting. For highlights: elegant museum-quality atmospheric backgrounds.
global_style_lock.technical_specs: High-quality digital illustration, dynamic composition for action scenes. For highlights: 3D axonometric miniature style with soft DreamWorks-quality lighting and textures. Museum posters include ENGLISH typography. Portrait orientation suitable for left panel layout.
global_style_lock.tone: Inspiring, celebratory of excellence, respectful (especially regarding tragedy). Focus on Mamba Mentality, competitive fire, and lasting legacy.
critical_rules: CARICATURE style for regular pages - exaggerated features (intense eyes, competitive expression)
MUSEUM POSTER style for p07, p08, p10 - 3D axonometric miniature with ENGLISH typography
NOT photorealistic - this is comic art / museum miniature art
For museum posters: Include elegant ENGLISH typography at bottom with event name and famous quote
Consistent character design - same facial features across all pages
Purple and gold Lakers colors prominent throughout
Respectful portrayal of tragedy (p10) - abstract, not graphic
ALL TEXT IN ENGLISH - NO CHINESE CHARACTERS

pages.prompt: Comic book illustration: Young boy Kobe Bryant (age 8-10) playing basketball on an outdoor court in Italy. Background shows Italian architecture (terracotta roofs, old buildings) with other kids watching. Warm Mediterranean sunlight. Basketball in hand, mid-dribble or jump shot. Expression shows pure joy and competitive fire. Comic art style, vibrant colors. NO text or watermarks.

pages.background: Italian setting, outdoor basketball court, Mediterranean atmosphere
